'''''Amon Hen'' 48''' is the forty-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published on [[29 December]] [[1980]].
==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: Lucy Matthews
* Editorial
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
* Contents
* Business
** By: [[Jonathan Simons]]
* [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Radio LotR]]/Back Issues
* Those Awful Orcs
** By: Virginia Luling
* Death in Aman
** By: Madawc Williams
* The Olog-hai
** By: John Madron
* [[Forodrim]]-Feast
* Review: ''J. R. R. Tolkien: als Wunscherf√ºllung und Weltdeutung''
** By: Manfred Zimmerman
* Review: ''[[The Individuated Hobbit]]''
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]] and Patrick Harpur
* Smial Please
* Tolk Folk
* Review: ''[[A Reader's Guide to The Silmarillion]]''
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
* Letters
* Helen's Heep
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* Brin's Bundle
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
